.. panel-info:: Panel Table Node First

  =====  =====  =======
    x      y       z
  =====  =====  =======
    1      2       3
    1      3       4
    1      4       5
  =====  =====  =======

  Here's a paragraph inside the panel, it's rendered inside a ``.panel-body``.

  The table above is not!

.. Tests tables inside a panel are rendered outside the `.panel-body`
.. Tests multiple nodes, the table should be outside the panel FIRST, the paragraphs inside.

.. http://getbootstrap.com/components/#panels-tables
